en.title: Scio in practice
en.detail:
Scio is a Scala SDK for building data pipelines in Dataflow on Google Cloud Platform.
Scio is an oss from Spotify.
Although there is official documentation and sample code for Scio, I feel that there is not much information available on Scio based on our experience with it.
In this session, we'll talk about how to use Scio in real world situations, based on our own experiences with Scio.

For urgent reasons, I'm going to talk about
Here's the explanation based on my Medium article.
And the article is in Japanese. I'm sorry...

The Medium article will be published in the night of October 17th.
I will post it on this Issue after it is published.
